Text: got your msgMark Bill Brogan had told me the news about TW and I think that will be a great opportunity Waiting around for the vaunted Calpine Human Resources machine to spring into action note the sarcasm is no fun and something this company is going to figure out the hard way Anyway best of luck both with your new role and to the Sooners going this season Patrick Wade Calpine Energy Services Louisiana Street Suite Houston Texas fax
